column2: "I've been asking people how they feel about A.I.S. Vega. So far, there haven't been any major complaints."
"On the other hand, my investigation of \"Evangelion Unit-01\" over there has been one surprise after another."
"I was hoping to adapt its structure and use it to improve our A.I.S., but it seems like it's too specific to the Eva Unit to easily modify."
"If you want to know the details, I'm afraid you'll have to wait for my formal report. Thanks for asking, though."
